question: Public Investment Fund (PIF) of which country has acquired over 2 per cent stake in Reliance Retail Ventures?
explanation:
Saudi Arabiaâ€™s Public Investment Fund (PIF) is set to invest Rs 9,555 crore (USD 1.29 billion) for 2.04 per cent equity stake in Reliance Retail Ventures (RRVL).
Saudi Crown Prince Mohammed bin Salman bin Abdulaziz Al Saud is the chairman of PIF. It had previously invested in several giant companies including Facebook, Boeing, and Disney.
